title: Bacon Cheddar Jalapeno Poppers
directions: Cut Cheddar cheese into 12 slices long enough to fit inside the jalapeno halves. Insert cheese slices into the halves. Wrap the jalapeno halves with the bacon slices, securing with a toothpick, if necessary. Place on a medium baking sheet.
Broil 5 to 10 minutes, or until the bacon is evenly brown.
